title: Tanks diving turrets is not the issue
body:
I have seen many discussions on Turrets on the boards recently, and I've seen many people suggesting things like making the turrets do %HP damage and/or true damage so that tanks can't dive so easily, and whilst I agree they don't hurt enough I don't think that's the issue at all. Squishies being able to dive turrets is the issue. 

Diving is an important part of a tanks job, and especially as a Gangplank player I get dived all the time. I don't feel salty at all if a jungle sejuani comes from behind my tower and her and the riven dive me, I can live with that and I shrug. But when a lee sin or kayn pops over the wall and THEY dive me at full hp under turret, take 5 hits and then make a clean escape at 10 minutes thus taking my tower, I just die a bit inside.  If I fuck up or I'm low health whatever, but this happens ALL the time and its not hard. 

Towers should provide safety, and they don't. 

Also I feel I am not given chance to group as I need to baby sit my squishy turret. A couple of games ago at about 15 minutes in I went to group with my team mid, and we won a 4v5 fight, killing two of them and losing one person and taking the mid turret. However, during that time their 1/4/0 Malzahar had destroyed both of my full health top lane turrets and just about escaped by the time I got to him. If he took the one turret I'd be like fine because its a trade-off but they got the better deal because I needed to group to help my behind team.

One thing I could suggest is that at a start we need laser turrets back. Bases are so easy to siege now its absurd. Another thing I'd suggest is maybe increasing the other towers' rate of fire. I say this because tower agro is really easy to abuse, and if the rate of fire is up (even if the damage has to go down a bit to compensate) then maybe If a kayn for example uses his ult to drop agro it will be sooner before the riven/pantheon etc takes aggro and starts to be punished for diving me. 

Sorry if I have repeated myself or explained myself poorly I haven't the time to proof read. 

P.S I have no issue with Riven specifically she is just being used as an example.

replies.body: I've suggested this before, but what if towers provided base armor penetration? Not flat, not %, but a tower ignores your BASE armor values (Or a percent of your base armor, perhaps) while not penetrating bonus armor. Tanks get to tank once they have armor, and squishies fear the might of the powerful turret.
I find this idea intriguing and worthy of an upvote and a comment, even if that comment really only amounts to a nice big this. Riot plz bring it up in meetings.

^This

######sorry I had to

I'd go with the %. Ignoring base armor makes it practically undivable by squishies(they should get chance too, although much less than tanks obviously) while full tanks like cho gath/malphite will keep on taking 70 dmg per hit while sitting at 5k hp.

On the other hand ignoring % will make tanks dive less overpowered and rather normal - still being able to dive but not tanking 40 turret hits, while it will still slightly reduce squishies chance of diving.
By the time cho and malphite reach 5k hp, most champs would and should be a bigger threat than turrets.
this might be a really good idea :)

I disagree.

I think that being able to control the threat of the turret is a very important part of the game, and an important skill to learn and master.

The problem is how LONG that Leona can survive under the tower with few tank items. 

If turrets switched to whoever was the biggest threat, tower dives would disappear. End of story. And that would be very bad for the games health.

Look at the turrets on Twisted Treeline, it's practicly impossible to dive under them as a squishy (hell even as a tank it's a risk) because of their higher fire rate. If they could leave the current tower HP on Summoner's Rift but just add the Twisted Treeline fire rate I think it would more or less fix the issue.

Would be too hard to last hit. Imagine last hitting under tower as Jhin or Caitlyn if the towers fired faster. They ALREADY attack faster than Jhin/Cait generally. Heaven forbid you are a mid laner with a garbage auto attack animation (Anivia and such) that has absurd wind-up.

A solution to this is to give turrets the "hunter's machete" type buff where the AS increases when they hit a champion.
Instead of laser turrets they should use the Twisted Treeline nexus turrets. 😈

Towers would feel way better if its attackspeed is higher but dealt less dmg with overall the same dps. Currently it takes an eternity for tower to switch agro, especially when someone goes into invulnerability(which is flooded in recent years of new champions btw) while a shot was travelling, the next shot takes 8 years to come out.

What if towers could Ground every enemy in range (or at least the target they are focusing)?
This way a full tank Sejuani would still be able to tank it, but a Lee Sin wouldn't be able to just dash his way out of an early dive on a full hp champion.
It's not even tanks that are diving turrets though, it's ADCs and mages.  Realistically, towers do so little damage and are so weak that they just don't provide any safe haven at all.

Possible ideas for turrets:

1) **Aggro drop range is 133% of aggro range.**

The point here is to make it harder to juggle aggro between two ranged, typically an adc and support.

2) **Breaking the turret's target laser immediately inflicts damage equal to the next turret shot.** 

Punishes juggling between squishies and rewards tanks who commit to a dive. Punishes cheese divers like Yi, Yasuo, Kayn, Zed who drop aggro with untargetability and leave range before taking a hit.

3) **Turrets deal mixed damage, adaptive between turret base damage and % target current hp.**

Punishes tanks who only stack armor or hp and rewards tanks with a balance of hp, MR, and armor.
